title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
.article, .post { max-width: 1500px !important; /* 设置更宽的显示区域 */ margin: 0 auto; /* 保持居中 */ }

Markdown Editor /* Set the overall layout */ body { display: flex; height: 100vh; margin: 0; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } #row-markdown { flex: 1; display: flex; } /* Style for the editor container */ #markdown-editor-container { flex: 1; width: 600px; padding: 10px; border-right: 1px solid #ccc; box-sizing: border-box; } /* Style for the preview container */ #preview { flex: 1; width: 600px; padding: 10px; overflow-y: auto; box-sizing: border-box; } /* Ensure CodeMirror editor fills its container */ .CodeMirror { height: 100%; } // Initialize CodeMirror editor var editor = CodeMirror.fromTextArea(document.getElementById("editor"), { mode: "markdown", lineNumbers: true, theme: "material" }); // Initialize Showdown converter var converter = new showdown.Converter(); // Update preview on editor input editor.on("keyup", function() { var markdown = editor.getValue(); document.getElementById("preview").innerHTML = converter.makeHtml(markdown); });
